#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	long n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%ld",&n);
		int ans=0;
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			while(n%2==0)
			{
				n=n/2;
				ans++;
			}
		}
		for(int i=3;i*i<=n&&n>1;i+=2)
		{
			if(n%i==0)
			{
				while(n%i==0)
				{
					ans++;
					n=n/i;
				}
			}
		}
		if(n!=1)
		ans++;
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
}
